member.name: T:ag.WPF.UpDown.UpDown
member.summary: Represents custom control with button spinners that allows incrementing and decrementing numeric values by using the spinner buttons and keyboard up/down arrows.

member.name: P:ag.WPF.UpDown.UpDown.UseGroupSeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether group separator is used for number formatting.

member.name: P:ag.WPF.UpDown.UpDown.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether UpDown is in read-only state.

member.name: P:ag.WPF.UpDown.UpDown.DecimalPlaces
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates the count of decimal digits shown at UpDown.

member.name: P:ag.WPF.UpDown.UpDown.NegativeForeground
member.summary: Gets or sets the Brush to apply to the text contents of UpDown when control's value is negative.

member.name: P:ag.WPF.UpDown.UpDown.Step
member.summary: Gets or sets the value to increment or decrement UpDown when the up or down buttons are clicked.

member.name: P:ag.WPF.UpDown.UpDown.MinValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum allowed value of UpDown.

member.name: P:ag.WPF.UpDown.UpDown.MaxValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed value of UpDown.

member.name: P:ag.WPF.UpDown.UpDown.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of UpDown.

member.summary: Determines UpDown foreground.
member.param: Array consists of current UpDown value, regular foreground brush and negative foreground brush
member.returns: Brush depended on current value sign.
